title: Test Bridge Extended for Issue #47 Scenarios
content:
Extended the Test Bridge API to support autonomous testing of all 20 Issue #47 scenarios:

**New Test Bridge Methods (test-bridge.js):**

1. Solo/Mute Methods:
   - toggleSolo(id, tabId) - Toggle solo mode for Quick Tab
   - toggleMute(id, tabId) - Toggle mute mode for Quick Tab
   - getVisibilityState(tabId) - Get visibility state with solo/mute status

2. Manager Panel Methods:
   - getManagerState() - Get panel state (visible, position, size, minimized tabs)
   - setManagerPosition(x, y) - Set manager position
   - setManagerSize(width, height) - Set manager size
   - closeAllMinimized() - Close all minimized Quick Tabs

3. Container Isolation Methods:
   - getContainerInfo() - Get all Quick Tabs grouped by container
   - createQuickTabInContainer(url, cookieStoreId) - Create QT in specific container
   - verifyContainerIsolation(id1, id2) - Verify two QTs are in different containers

4. Debug Mode Methods:
   - getSlotNumbering() - Get slot numbering information
   - setDebugMode(enabled) - Enable/disable debug mode

5. Geometry/Z-Index Methods:
   - getQuickTabGeometry(id) - Get position, size, z-index
   - verifyZIndexOrder(ids) - Verify z-index stacking order

**Message Handlers (content.js):**
All handlers follow the existing pattern:
- Use browser.tabs.sendMessage to communicate with content script
- Include try/catch error handling
- Return {success, data} format
- Async handlers use (async () => { ... })() pattern
- All handlers have // eslint-disable-next-line max-depth comments

**Key Implementation Details:**
- Solo/Mute handlers access domainTab.toggleSolo() and domainTab.toggleMute()
- Visibility state checks domainTab.shouldBeVisible(tabId)
- Manager state accesses panelManager.stateManager.panelState
- Container info groups tabs by cookieStoreId
- Geometry reads from DOM element.getBoundingClientRect() and computed styles
- Z-index verification ensures correct stacking order (higher = front)

**Testing Coverage:**
These 15 new methods enable testing of:
- Scenarios 3, 4, 13 (Solo/Mute)
- Scenarios 5, 6, 12, 15 (Manager Panel)
- Scenarios 8, 19, 20 (Container Isolation)
- Scenario 16 (Debug Mode)
- Scenarios 17, 18 (Geometry/Z-Index)
